scenario.name: Hold with declined stream
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:answer@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:answer@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 c=IN IP4 10.10.6.214 a=sendrecv a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 m=video 0 RTP/AVP 99 34 c=IN IP4 127.0.0.1 a=inactive

ACK sip:answer@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:answer@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:answer@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: alice <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:answer@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 INVITE Contact: sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=sendonly m=video 0 RTP/AVP 34 a=inactive
